caption.title: Effects of puerarin on intestinal goblet cells and related genes in mice.
caption.p: (A) Counts of PAS-positive goblet cells per villus. (B–D, E–G) mRNA expression levels of Muc2, Klf4, and Reg3g in the small intestine and colon of mice. Six mice per group. As compared with the NC group: *P < 0.05, **P < 0.01. As compared with the HFD group: #P < 0.05.
